name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.network.counts.cache.max.size
description:
The maximum number of entries the datanode per-host network error
    count cache may contain.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-single-resource-mb
description:
The maximum size (in MB) of a single resource a map reduce job
    is allow to submit for localization via files, libjars, archives, and
    jobjar command line arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to
    0 the limit is ignored.

name: dfs.datanode.max.transfer.threads
description:
Specifies the maximum number of threads to use for transferring data
        in and out of the DN.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.minimum-allowed-tasks
description:
The minimum allowed tasks that
  can be speculatively re-executed at any time.

name: dfs.qjournal.select-input-streams.timeout.ms
description: Timeout in milliseconds for accepting streams from JournalManagers.

name: dfs.namenode.decommission.interval
description:
Namenode periodicity in seconds to check if
    decommission or maintenance is complete. Support multiple time unit
    suffix(case insensitive), as described in dfs.heartbeat.interval.
    If no time unit is specified then seconds is assumed.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.connection.timeout.ms
description: Connection timeout for probing dead node in milliseconds.

name: dfs.client.failover.connection.retries.on.timeouts
description:
Expert only. The number of retry attempts a failover IPC client
    will make on socket timeout when establishing a server connection.
